ada niwadu dawasakuth wechchi eke mama giya blog sanchareka.lankawe siyalu madhyanta wada diyuna blog newa.issara mama blog kiyawanna kammali.anika kalawelawe prashnekuth thibba sahenna.eeka nisa kalathurakin thamayi blog baluwe.ape naganam blog balanawa.anna kawadahari dawasaka blog diyunuwen diyunuwata pathwela ma(r)katin paraka awashyathawa danuna dawasaka amathanna niyamama kena ape naga.mokada eyayi kiyawana, hoyaganna, hiki hiki gaga rasa windina siyalu blog apitath kiyawanna balapam karana nisa.ee blog eka api kiyawanathuru ee ad eka eka digata dhawanaya wenawa ara 'budu thaththe bonna..bonna.bonna" kiyala thaththa 'mata thawa bonna ba yakow" kiyapu kathandare wage.

ow.mama as deka arapu mulma wathawedima dakke eyawa.eyage dilihemin thibunu tharu kata wage as deka.eya eka athakin pinsalakuth anith athin diya sayam kalawam karapu thatiyak wage ekakuth athe thiyagena man diha balagena hitiya.eya hariyata man diha baluwe alutha ipadunu punchi putha diha amma kenek balan innawa wage.habayi mama punchi puthek wage anduweth na.eya mawa amma kenek wage badagaththeth na.eeth eyage mune andila thibunu hinawa mawa badagena kiti kitiye therapuwa wage thamayi mata danune.man kochchara wasanawanthada?lokaya dakinna as deka arapu palaweni wathawema eyage hinawen, ee hinawen hangila thibunu eyage aadaren mage lokema pirila giye anna ee widihata.

kotipathi wyaparikayakuge niwasaka mehekariyaka lesa sita rupiyal kotiyak pamana watina manik ha ranbadu soragath kanthawaka boralla polisiya magin athadanguwata gena thibe.ekdaru mawaka wu athadanguwata gath sakakara kanthawa aluthkade anka deka adhikaranaya wetha idiripath kirimen pasu me masa 23 dakwa rakshitha bandhanagara gatha kara athi bawa polisiya pawasiya.mese rakshitha bandhanagara gatha kara aththe rajagiriye padinchi krishnamurthi susilawathi (28) namathi kanthawaki.
kese ho mama dan sitinne gangodawila apa sathuwa thibu niwasin idam dekak thunak mehata wennata wu nandalage gedaraya.
